The Unofficial Google Music Api¶

Python api for Google Music.

Api Features¶

Authentication¶

class gmapi.api.Api¶
login(email, password)¶

Authenticates the api with the given credentials. Returns True on success, False on failure.

Parameters:
  • email – eg test@gmail.com
  • password – plaintext password. It will not be stored and is sent over ssl.
logout()¶

Logs out of the api. Returns True on success, False on failure.

Getting Library Information¶

class gmapi.api.Api
get_all_songs()¶

Returns a list of song dictionaries.

get_playlists()¶

Returns a dictionary which maps playlist name to id for all user-defined playlists. The dictionary does not include autoplaylists.

get_playlist_songs(playlist_id)¶

Returns a list of song dictionaries, which include entryIds keys for the given playlist.

Parameters:playlist_id – id of the playlist to load.

Song download, streaming, and upload¶

class gmapi.api.Api
get_song_download_info(song_id)¶

Returns a tuple of (download url, download_count). GM allows 2 downloads per song.

Parameters:song_id – a single song id.
get_stream_url(song_id)¶

Returns a url that points to the audio file for this song. Reading the file does not require authentication. This is only intended for streaming. The streamed audio does not contain metadata. Use get_song_download_info() to download complete files.

Parameters:song_id – a single song id.
upload(filenames)¶

Uploads the MP3s stored in the given filenames. Returns a mapping of filename: GM song id for each successful upload. Returns an empty dictionary if all uploads fail.

Parameters:filenames – a list of filenames, or a single filename

Playlist manipulation¶

class gmapi.api.Api
add_songs_to_playlist(playlist_id, song_ids)¶

Adds songs to a playlist.

Parameters:
  • playlist_id – id of the playlist to add to.
  • song_ids – a list of song ids, or a single song id.
change_playlist_name(playlist_id, new_name)¶

Changes the name of a playlist.

Parameters:
  • playlist_id – id of the playlist to rename.
  • new_title – desired title.
create_playlist(name)¶

Creates a new playlist.

Parameters:title – the title of the playlist to create.
delete_playlist(playlist_id)¶

Deletes a playlist.

Parameters:playlist_id – id of the playlist to delete.
remove_song_from_playlist(song_ids, playlist_id)¶

Removes songs from a playlist.

Parameters:song_ids – a list of song ids, or a single song id.

Song manipulation¶

class gmapi.api.Api
change_song_metadata(songs)¶

Changes the metadata for songs. Songs are presumed to be in GM dictionary format.

Parameters:songs – a list of song dictionaries, or a single song dictionary.
delete_song(song_ids)¶

Deletes songs from the entire library.

Parameters:song_ids – a list of song ids, or a single song id.

Searching¶

class gmapi.api.Api
search(query)¶

Searches for songs, artists and albums. GM ignores punctuation.

Parameters:query – the search query.
